name: Subworld: End Prologue
description:
SUBWORLD: END PROLOGUE

The Tea Lady is sent to a desperate world, being eaten away by a great nothing. help her on her way in this short and simple. narrative visual novel as we enter into the Prologue of a much larger upcoming game, Subworld.

Subworld: End Prologue is but a small glimpse into a larger world. Acting a short introduction to the game of Subworld, coming out in 2018. 

Truth of the matter is I am depressed. I have been for a long time and Subworld is a reflection of how that depression can affect creativity. I want to create a game that teaches literacy, challenges creativity and moral choices and would eventually be a lot of fun and a powerful experience. this game is NOT the actual Subworld game. it' no where near what the engine of the upcoming game will be, (Including a unique Write or Fight 'combat' system).
